content:
I'm actually using a simple garter stitch pattern for the scarf, and I think it's turning out really nicely. I haven't thought about adding any special touches, but that's a great idea! A personalized message or a small charm could really make the gift even more special.

As for craft stores, I do love Michaels! They have a great selection of yarns and fabrics, and their sales are always a great opportunity to stock up on supplies. I also like shopping online at Amazon and Craftsy, they have a wide range of products and often have good deals on supplies and classes.

By the way, speaking of yarn, I've also been wanting to get back into embroidery. I bought some new embroidery floss and a set of embroidery hoops during that same trip to Michaels, and I've been working on a small project during my lunch break at work. It's been really fun to pick up again and I'm excited to see how it turns out.
